name: Connectify
description:
Welcome to the Connectify puzzle! The object of the game is to connect dots with the same numbers in a line without crossing other lines. For an easy game, a 3x3 playing field is available, and for fans of complex riddles there is a 6x6 field. If the field is larger, then there will be more points to connect.
The game records your time to reward you with stars. If you complete the puzzle faster, than you can get more stars.
